page.title: 05POPULATION AND EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: The majority of people who live in West Kirby,Caldy and Newton work for the most part in Liverpool,Birkenhead or in the industrial centres on the northern part of the Wirral. Much of the employment within the area is in the lower paid service industries and provides a lot of part time work. Those people who work in Liverpool or Birkenhead commute daily by car,bus or train.There is a lot of movement in and out of the area because of the demands of employment. There is a large and growing population of elderly retired people who find this a good area to retire into.This has created employment as sheltered housing and old peoples homes are opened.West kirby with its flat centre and facilities is ideal for these people.
